remarks: - Lemma for finite sum closures.  (The "-" before "Lemma" forces the math content to be displayed in the Statement List - NM 11-Feb-2008.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jun-2014.)
statement:
fsumcllem.1 $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
fsumcllem.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x + y ) e. S ) $.
fsumcllem.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumcllem.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. S ) $.
fsumcl2lem.5 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
fsumcl2lem $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. S ) $.
$d A k x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d S k x y $.
$d k ph x y $.
